00049 // Forward-declare the class.
00050 template <typename T, const unsigned int D> class KDTree;
00051

00054 std::istream & operator >> (std::istream &in, KDTree<T, D> &kdtree);

00057 std::ostream & operator << (std::ostream &out, const KDTree<T, D> &kdtree);

00070 template <typename T, const unsigned int D>
00071 class KDTree {
00072 public:
00074   static unsigned const int Dimensions = D;
00075 
00077   typedef Vector<T, D> Point;
00078 
00080   typedef VectorDistance<T> Neighbour;
00081 
00082   // Constructors and destructors.
00083   KDTree(); 
00084   ~KDTree(); 
00085 
00086   // Basic kd-tree operations.
00087   bool build(const DataSet<T, D>& train_set, unsigned int bucket_size = 32); 
00088 
00089   #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DISABLE_CPP0X
00090   template <template <typename, typename Compare> class KContainer>
00091   void knn(const Point &p, unsigned int K, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, const T &epsilon = Traits<T>::zero(), bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00092   #else
00093   template <template <typename, typename Compare> class KContainer = KVector>
00094   void knn(const Point &p, unsigned int K, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, const T &epsilon = Traits<T>::zero(), bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00095   #endif
00096 
00097   void all_in_range(const Point &p, const T &distance, std::vector<Neighbour> &output, bool ignore_p_in_tree = false) const; 
00098 
00100   const Point &operator [] (unsigned int index) const;
00101 
00102   // Stream operators.
00103   friend std::istream &operator >> <>(std::istream &in, KDTree &kdtree);
00104   friend std::ostream &operator << <>(std::ostream &out, const KDTree &kdtree);
00105 
00106   // Kd-tree properties.
00107   unsigned int size() const { return num_elements; } 
00108 
00109 #ifdef KCHE_TREE_DEBUG
00110   bool verify() const;
00111 #endif
00112 
00113 private:
00114   // Internal methods.
00115   void release(); 
00116 
00117   // Kd-tree data.
00118   KDNode<T, D> *root; 
00119   Point *data; 
00120   unsigned int *permutation; 
00121   unsigned int *inverse_perm; 
00122   unsigned int num_elements; 
00123 
00124   // File serialization settings.
00125   static const char *file_header; 
00126   static const unsigned short file_header_length; 
00127   static const unsigned short file_version[2]; 
00128   static const unsigned short signature; 
00129 };
00130 
00131 } // namespace kche_tree
